attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+400%}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom (2nd Job)} val={+40}>

attackStats.name: Magic Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura.png} tip={Dark Aura - Passive (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/spell-boost.png} tip={Spell Boost (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-artist.png} tip={Staff Artist (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-mastery.png} tip={Staff Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-expert.png} tip={Staff Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/aura-scythe.png} tip={Aura Scythe (5th Job)} val={+60}>

attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-artist.png} tip={Staff Artist (1st Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-mastery.png} tip={Staff Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={toggle} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-rage.png} tip={Battle Rage (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-mastery.png} tip={Battle Mastery (3rd Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-expert.png} tip={Staff Expert (4th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={toggle} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-rage.png} tip={Battle Rage (4th Job)} val={+10%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/spell-boost.png} tip={Spell Boost (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={toggle} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura.png} tip={Dark Aura (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg type={toggle} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-rage.png} tip={Battle Rage (4th Job)} val={+25%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/for-liberty.png} tip={For Liberty (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura-boss-rush.png} tip={Dark Aura - Boss Rush (Hyper Skill)} val={+5%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-mastery.png} tip={Battle Mastery (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/spell-boost.png} tip={Spell Boost (4th Job)} val={+22%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura-enhance.png} tip={Weakening Aura - Enhance (Hyper Skill)} val={+5%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} val={+8% while toggled}>

buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-rage.png} tip={Battle Rage (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)}>(30s cd) | <bold text={Auras}> [ <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/hasty-aura.png} tip={Hasty Aura (1st Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/draining-aura.png} tip={Draining Aura (2nd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/blue-aura.png} tip={Blue Aura (3rd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura.png} tip={Dark Aura (4th Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura.png} tip={Weakening Aura (4th Job)}> ]

buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/master-of-death.png} tip={Master of Death (Hyper Skill)} dur={[30s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/for-liberty.png} tip={For Liberty (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/aura-scythe.png} tip={Aura Scythe (5th Job)} dur={[40s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/abyssal-lightning.png} tip={Abyssal Lightning (5th Job)} dur={[40s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}>

buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/party-shield.png} tip={Party Shield (4th Job)} dur={[40s](-10% | 180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](-MP | 60s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Brighton in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

build: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/combat-teleport.png} tip={Combat Teleport}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-artist.png} tip={Staff Artist}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/hasty-aura.png} tip={Hasty Aura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/triple-blow.png} tip={Triple Blow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/ordinary-conversion.png} tip={Ordinary Conversion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-mastery.png} tip={Staff Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-boost.png} tip={Staff Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/draining-aura.png} tip={Draining Aura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/quad-blow.png} tip={Quad Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-chain.png} tip={Dark Chain}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/power-stance.png} tip={Power Stance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-conditioning.png} tip={Dark Conditioning}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-mastery.png} tip={Battle Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/blue-aura.png} tip={Blue Aura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/quintuple-blow.png} tip={Quintuple Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-burst.png} tip={Battle Burst}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/staff-expert.png} tip={Staff Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/spell-boost.png} tip={Spell Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/finishing-blow.png} tip={Finishing Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura.png} tip={Dark Aura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura.png} tip={Weakening Aura}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/party-shield.png} tip={Party Shield}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-rage.png} tip={Battle Rage}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis.png} tip={Dark Genesis}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: [Training]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Dark Genesis - Cooldown Cutter}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis-reinforce.png} tip={Dark Genesis - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis-additional-reinforce.png} tip={Dark Genesis - Additional Reinforce}> Dark Genesis - Cooldown Cutter, Reinforce and Additional Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura-enhance.png} tip={Weakening Aura - Enhance}> Weakening Aura - Enhance_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura-boss-rush.png} tip={Dark Aura - Boss Rush}> Dark Aura - Boss Rush_>[Bossing]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-aura-boss-rush.png} tip={Dark Aura - Boss Rush}> Dark Aura - Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura-enhance.png} tip={Weakening Aura - Enhance}> Weakening Aura - Enhance_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/blue-aura-dispel-magic.png} tip={Blue Aura - Dispel Magic}> Blue Aura - Dispel Magic_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/party-shield-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Party Shield - Cooldown Cutter}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/party-shield-enhance.png} tip={Party Shield - Enhance}> Party Shield - Cooldown Cutter and Enhance_Battle Mage Hyper Skill Passives are flexible, refer to the Class Doc for more info_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/finishing-blow.png} tip={Finishing Blow and Aura Scythe - Ambassador Scythe (4th Job / 5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/sweeping-staff.png} tip={Sweeping Staff (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis.png} tip={Dark Genesis (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-burst.png} tip={Battle Burst (3rd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/triple-blow.png} tip={Triple Blow (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/quad-blow.png} tip={Quad Blow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-chain.png} tip={Dark Chain (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/quintuple-blow.png} tip={Quintuple Blow (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-burst.png} tip={Battle Burst (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/finishing-blow.png} tip={Finishing Blow and Aura Scythe - Ambassador Scythe (4th Job / 5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-genesis.png} tip={Dark Genesis (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/sweeping-staff.png} tip={Sweeping Staff (Hyper Skill)}>

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/End_of_Special_Training} title={"End of Special Training"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Triple Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 170%, Max Monsters Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 3\n[Passive Effect - Condemnation Damage: +60% points]
primary.desc: Strike forward 3 times with your staff
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Combat Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Horizontal range: 210, Vertical range: 290\nBlink Jump: Consume 25 MP to jump up a certain distance. Can be linked with Teleport 1 time(s) before landing, reduces the delay between Teleports when linking with Teleport consecutively after Blink Jump.
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key together in the air will perform an Up Jump<bp_Teleport can be used without a platform once before landing_>
Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Hasty Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 8, Speed: +10, Attack Speed +1 level\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Speed: 30, Max Speed: 20, Jump: 20, Attack Speed +2 levels, Avoidability: +15%]
details: After <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}> is learned, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/combat-teleport.png} tip={Combat Teleport (1st Job)}> teleport range is increased<bp_This function can be toggled ON/OFF by right-clicking the skill_>

primary.name: Condemnation
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 10 enemies, inflicts damage to 7 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 7\nAttacking a boss 2 times will count as defeating 1 enemy.\nOnce activated, it cannot activate again until 9 sec have passed.
primary.desc: While toggled, after defeating 10 enemies, your dark spirit will unleash a deadly attack
details: Attacking a boss twice will count as defeating 1 enemy
Ignores Damage Reflect

primary.name: Staff Artist
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Critical Rate: +15%, DEF: +150

primary.name: Quad Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 5 Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 4\n[Passive Effect - Grim Contract Damage: +80% points, does not stack with the passive effect of Triple Blow
primary.desc: Strike forward 4 times with your staff
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/grim-contract.png} tip={Grim Contract (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount<bp_Replaces the passive effect of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/triple-blow.png} tip={Triple Blow (1st Job)}>_>

primary.name: Dark Chain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 600%, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Knock Down Duration: 8 sec
primary.desc: Creates a chain that pulls in and stuns enemies
details: Can be linked with any Blow-type skills

primary.name: Draining Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 28, Recovers HP for 1% of damage dealt. Cannot recover again for 5 sec after a recovery takes place. Damage dealt by Battle Mage also heals any party members within the range of Draining Aura.\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Max HP recovery every 4 sec: 2% + 1000, Max HP recovery every time you eliminate an enemy: 1%]
primary.desc: While active, successful attacks restore HP based on damage dealt
details: [Passive]: Permanently restores HP every few seconds and restores %Max HP upon defeating an enemy
Damage dealt by caster also restores HP to nearby party members
Recovery amount cannot exceed 20% of your Max HP

primary.name: Staff Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Attack Speed increased for 200 sec

primary.name: Staff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Staff Mastery: +50%, Magic ATT: +30, Critical Hit Rate: +20%

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: Ordinary Conversion
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +150%\nMP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 3% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Increases %Max HP and grants a chance for attacks to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Grim Contract
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 8 enemies, inflicts damage to 8 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 245%, Number of Attacks: 8\nOnce activated, it cannot activate again until 8 sec have passed.
details: Reduces number of enemies required to activate to 8 and time between activations to 8 secs
Increases %Damage, Number of Hits, and Max Enemies Hit

primary.name: Quintuple Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 235%, Number of Attacks: 5\n[Passive Effect - Grim Contract II Damage: +100% points, does not stack with the passive effect of Triple Blow and Quad Blow]
primary.desc: Strike forward 5 times with your staff
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/grim-contract-ii.png} tip={Grim Contract II (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount<bp_Replaces the passive effect of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/triple-blow.png} tip={Triple Blow (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/quad-blow.png} tip={Quad Blow (2nd Job)}>_>

primary.name: Battle Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 900%.\n[Passive Effect: Dark Chain's Damage: +50%]
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pulling enemies you pass through
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-chain.png} tip={Dark Chain (2nd Job)}>
Can be linked with any Blow-type skills

primary.name: Blue Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12 per sec, Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Damage Taken: -15%.\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, DEF: +150%, Damage Taken: -25%]

primary.name: Dark Shock
primary.shortDesc: Increases the MP Cost of Combat Teleport by 15. Teleporting creates a streak of black lightning between your start and end positions. [Black Lightning] Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +150%p. Afflicts enemies with Dark Brand for 15 sec. If you attack enemies with Dark Brand, the brand activates and deals an additional 400% damage 4 number of times. Brand-consuming attacks deal 20% bonus damage against bosses. Brand is consumed upon attacking 15 times.
primary.desc: While toggled, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/combat-teleport.png} tip={Combat Teleport (1st Job)}> teleporting creates a shock attack that applies a "Dark Brand" debuff
details: [Dark Brand]: Attacking this enemy deals an additional attack<bp_The debuff is consumed upon attacking the enemy 15 times_If the enemy is a boss, your attacks deals increased %Damage_>
Shock attack deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amount

primary.name: Battle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Critical Damage: +15%

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Dark Conditioning
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability: 25%, Speed: 30, Max Speed: 10

primary.name: Grim Contract II
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 6 enemies, inflicts damage to 8 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 325%, Number of Attacks: 10\nOnce activated, it cannot activate again until 6 sec have passed.
details: Reduces number of enemies required to activate to 6 and time between activations to 6 secs
Increases %Damage and number of hits

primary.name: Teleport Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Ver. 2 Horizontal Range: +65, Teleport Ver. 2 Vertical Range: +30
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the horizontal teleport distance of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/combat-teleport.png} tip={Combat Teleport (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Finishing Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 4 sec, Crit Rate: +25%, Ignore DEF: 20%
primary.desc: Strike forward with a chance to stun enemeis
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Dark Genesis
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 8, Stun Duration: 4 sec\n[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Skills] Your attack skills have a 60% chance to hit a single enemy with lightning, dealing 250% damage, and +60% damage on Dark Chain, Battle Burst, and Dark Shock]
details: [Final Attack]: Your attacks have a chance to hit a single enemy with a lightning strike

[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-chain.png} tip={Dark Chain (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/battle-burst.png} tip={Battle Burst (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}>
Ignores Damage Reflect

primary.name: Dark Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 16, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Magic ATT +15%]
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Weakening Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 26, Enemy DEF: -20%. Requires 2 sec to apply but will be in effect 60 sec after aura deactivation.\nCooldown: 3 sec
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Battle Rage
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Damage: +25%, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +10%
Reduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 2.
Excludes Condemnation, Ambassador Scythe when enhanced by Aura Scythe, Altar of Annihilation, and Grim Harvest from max enemies hit reduction.
[Passive Effects: Max HP +30%, Max MP +30%]
primary.desc: While active, increases %Damage, %Crit Rate, and %Crit Damage but reduces Max Enemies Hit for all skills is reduced by 1/3, however will not be reduced below 2
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP/MP

Max Enemies Hit reduction excludes some summons, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}>, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/aura-scythe.png} tip={Aura Scythe (5th Job)}>(Ambassador Scythe), <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/altar-of-annihilation.png} tip={Altar of Annihilation (5th Job)}>, and <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/grim-harvest.png} tip={Grim Harvest (5th Job)}>

primary.name: Party Shield
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Duration 40 sec, -10% damage when hit with an attack that inflicts damage of a certain proportion of Max HP.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Creates a shield that increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Staff Expert
primary.shortDesc: Staff Mastery: +70%. Magic ATT: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Magic Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Spell Boost
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +22%, Magic ATT: +10%, Damage: +15%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Grim Contract III
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 6 enemies, inflicts damage to 10 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 12\nOnce activated, it cannot activate again until 5 sec have passed.
details: Reduces time between activations to 5 secs
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

hyperPassive.name: Dark Genesis - Additional Reinforce
hyperPassive.desc: Increases %Damage to the Final Attack lightning strike

hyperPassive.name: Weakening Aura - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases Final Damage enemies receive by 5%.

hyperPassive.name: Blue Aura - Dispel Magic
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Clears Status on party members every 5 sec.

hyperPassive.name: Party Shield - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Damage reduction rate on attacks by ratio of max HP +10%.

hyperActive.name: Master of Death
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30 sec, Number of Attacks Blow skill: +1\nnumber of required souls reduced to 1, Condemnation Final Damage: +50%, Reduces Condemnation cooldown by 0.5 sec every time you successfully use a dark-attribute attack (besides Condemnation).\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack for Blow-type skills and provides bonus effects to <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}>
details: While active, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}> gains the following effects:<bp_Reduced number of enemies required to activate (to 5 enemies)_Attack has increased %Final Damage_Cooldown is slightly reduced upon successfully landing a Dark-attribute attack_>

hyperActive.name: Sweeping Staff
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Damage: 1080%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 13 sec
hyperActive.desc: Swing a giant staff and smashes it into the ground

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Aura Scythe
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100 per sec, Duration: 40 sec, grants the effect of all your auras. Additional Magic ATT increase by 60 for the self.
The Aura Scythe enhances your Blow skills. MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 12. Additional Critical Rate: +50%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +50%.
Can be toggled On/Off.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: When toggled, grants the effects of all your auras and enhances your Blow-type skill into a slashing attack
details: While active, grants increased Magic Attack for yourself

While active, aura type skills cannot be used except for <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/weakening-aura.png} tip={Weakening Aura (4th Job)}> and Aura Scythe can be used<bp_When the skill ends, the previously applied aura will be applied again_>

fifthMain.name: Altar of Annihilation
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Altar Duration: 40 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1675%, Number of Attacks: 4
The orb takes 0.8 sec to move to the next altar. After 2 altars, the number of attacks increases by 2 for every additional altar.
A new altar can be summoned every 23 sec, up to 4 altars.
Enemies hit gain Dark Brand.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an altar where when there are more than two altars active, an orb will travel between altars damaging enemies that it passes through
details: If no altars are active, pressing the Down Arrow Key with the Skill Key will place 2 altars at once
A new altar is gained every 23 secs (up to 4 altars)
Orb will apply the "Dark Brand" debuff from <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}>
Unaffected Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Grim Harvest
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000. Summons the Grim Harvest that attacks for 30 sec every 4 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1870%, Number of Attacks: 12
Use the skill again to re-summon near you. Can be used once every 10 sec.
If the Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, its duration increases by 0.2 sec per enemy. If it hits a boss, its duration increases by 2 sec. Duration increased to up to 3 sec for each attack.
Attack interval becomes 50% with the Master of Death applied, but attacks do not increase the skill's duration in that case.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant reaper that attacks nearby enemies
details: Using the Skill again will re-summoned near you
If Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, the duration is increased slightly<bp_If the enemy is a boss instead, the duration is increased whenever the summon hits it_>

If <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/master-of-death.png} tip={Master of Death (Hyper Skill)}> is active, the time between attacks is reduced but attacks from the reaper will not increase the duration of the summon
Ignores Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Abyssal Lightning
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting and disarmament.
Duration: 40 sec., Normal Monster Damage: +30%. Periodically creates 2 netherworld passages, the passages remain for 15 sec, and up to 6 can exist in the map. Dark Brand attacks must be activated 30 times to consume the brand.
Netherworld Lightning: Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1870, Number of Attacks: 6, Additional Critical Rate: +100%, Ignores additional 20% Enemy DEF, Cooldown: 0.6 sec.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, periodically creates passageways that you can teleport to
details: To teleport to a passage, press the Skill Key and any Arrow Key together to move to the nearest passage<bp_Up to 6 passageways can exist at a time_Using a passageway will activate <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}>_>
While active, "Dark Brand" debuff will only be consumed after activating 30 times

When <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/dark-shock.png} tip={Dark Shock (3rd Job)}> or the "Dark Brand" debuff activates, lightning will strike near you damaging nearby enemies<bp_The attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increased %Ignore DEF_>
You are invincible during the initial cast and ending of the skill
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

fifthBoost.name: Triple Blow Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Condemnation Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Quad Blow Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dark Chain Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Quintuple Blow Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Battle Burst Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dark Shock Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Finishing Blow Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Finishing Blow's and Aura Scythe's Ambassador Scythe Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Dark Genesis Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Sweeping Staff Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/condemnation.png} tip={Condemnation (1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Condemnation
masteryCore.shortDesc:
The dark spirit appears with the next attack after defeating 6 enemies, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 930%, Number of Attacks: 12. Attacking a boss 2 times will count as defeating 1 enemy.
Collect 1 soul upon defeating 4 enemies with Condemnation or attacking a boss
Collect 1 soul upon defeating 12 enemies with Ambassador Scythe or attacking a boss 3 times.
The power of the dark spirit is enhanced when Condemnation activates while having 4 souls, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1475%, Number of Attacks: 14
Once the dark spirit's final attack activates, it cannot activate again until 4 sec have passed.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/finishing-blow.png} tip={Finishing Blow and Aura Scythe - Ambassador Scythe (4th Job / 5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/battle-mage/sweeping-staff.png} tip={Sweeping Staff (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Finishing Blow
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 66, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 666%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Chance: 92%, Stun Duration: 5 sec, Critical Rate: +26%, Ignore Defense: +22%\n[Passive Effect: Ambassador Scythe Damage: +50%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Sweeping Staff
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 88, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 690%, Number of Attacks: 5, Magic Explosion Damage: 555%, Number of Attacks: 5, Number of Magic Explosions: 4\nCooldown: 13 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Crimson Pact
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
The dark spirit releases its true power, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1772%, Number of Attacks: 11, Chase Cuts: 48
The dark spirit reveals its true appearance after the pact is complete and devours all life, Damage: 2863%, Number of Attacks: 14, Chase Cuts: 22
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Battle Mage is an INT mage class part of the Resistance. What's special about Battle Mages is that they have special aura buffs that affect party members as well. There are some useful buffs such as %Boss Damage and Attack Speed boosts. As well, Battle Mages has a dark spirit that follows them around and periodically attacks alongside you
